abstract: A video clip shows what it would feel like to ride a roller coaster whose track charts the Dow Jones industrial average from October 2007 to March 2009.
snippet: A video clip shows what it would feel like to ride a roller coaster whose track charts the Dow Jones industrial average from October 2007 to March 2009.
lead_paragraph: For those who like their metaphors firmly literalized, this clip shows what it would feel like to ride a roller coaster whose track charts the Dow Jones industrial average from October 2007 to March 2009.

headline.main: The Dow as a Roller-Coaster Ride (Literally)
